auth_windows_main_sql_auth: select sys_user_role.sys_role_name from {schema}.sys_role inner join {schema}.sys_user_role on sys_user_role.sys_role_name=sys_role.sys_role_name inner join {schema}.sys_user on sys_user.sys_user_id=sys_user_role.sys_user_id where sys_role_sts='ACTIVE' and lower(sys_user_email)=lower(@sys_user_email) and sys_user_sts='ACTIVE';
auth_windows_main_sql_superlogin: select sys_user.sys_user_id,sys_user_windows_account from {schema}.sys_user inner join {schema}.sys_user_role on sys_user_role.sys_user_id = sys_user.sys_user_id and sys_user_role.sys_role_name='SYSADMIN' where sys_user_sts='ACTIVE' and lower(sys_user_email)=lower(@sys_user_email)
